Um, Icedeamon, Iron Raptor is practically on top of Zenyak at this point, 
sliding a sword at his would be hard.

::Zenyak::

Zenyak screams as fangs dig into his shoulder and claws into his shoulder, 
the impact slamming him away from the swords stabbing toward him, one of the 
swords managing to cut through his faceplate.

"Computer," he says, barely managing the words, "Self destruct in 10 seconds. 
If I don't override it, blow this place to the pit!"

The computer starts to count down.

He growls, looking at Iron Raptor, "I suggest you let me out, Maximal," he 
barely chokes out, "If you want to keep your life!"
